src_original: gzhag go/_/gang tshhe ye shes rlung gis ni/_/rang rig dag ni skyes nas su/_/
sangs rgyas la sogs bsregs pa yis/_/dga' ba la sogs ting 'dzin skye/_/
gzhon nu ma yi bde ba dang /_/lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta bar/_/rang gi sad
pa las gsal bas/_/gnyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur/_/thog ma tha ma
dbus med cing /_/'khor min mya ngan 'das pa'ang min/_/bdag med
gzhan yang yod ma yin/_/de ni mchog tu bde chen nyid/_/bdag med ye
shes nyid gyur gang /_/bdag gzhan nges par rig pa yang /_/mkha' mnyam
skyon bral lhan cig skyes/_/thams cad lus la rang bzhin gnas/_/dga' ba
dang po srid rang bzhin/_/de bzhin mchog dga' 'khor ba nyid/_/dga'
bral 'khor ba'i bdag nyid de/_/gsum pa lhan cig skyes pa med/_/dga' ba
dang ni mchog dga' nyid/_/rnam pa'i dga' ba la sogs pa/_/gsum po
spangs par 'gyur ba ni/_/bzhi pa gang las skye bar 'gyur/_/de bas gsum
